actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Committee on Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Judiciary. Reported to Senate by Senator Thurmond without amendment and with a preamble. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 803.
Passed Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution designating the week of April 29 through May 5, 1984 as "National Week of the Ocean".

summary.text: Designates the week of April 29 through May 5, 1984, as National Week of the Ocean.

titles.title: A joint resolution designating the week of April 29 through May 5, 1984 as "National Week of the Ocean".
